staticContent.content:
This  site is owned , run and managed by  Burke Insurances ltd. . Burke Insurances ltd. was established by Jack Burke in April 1965 providing Insurance Broking services to the West of Ireland.

 

Over the last ten years the business has acquired the practices of a number of other Insurance brokers and is today a leading provider of Insurance Services in its region and nationally in the areas of Professional Indemnity Insurance, Online Office insurance and other medical technology insurance and IT Insurance.

The firm is a founding member of the Irish Brokers Association and has a proven commitment to quality. Its knowledgeable staff   are focused on customer satisfaction which translates into long term profitable and mutually beneficial relationships for all concerned .

 

The key personnel you need to know/contact in the Public Liability  Insurance areas are.

Sean Burke - sburke@burkeins.ie
Paul Cawthorne -pcawthorne@burkeins.ie
Ann Burke - aburke@burkeins.ie
Michelle Shaughnessy - mshaughnessy@burkeins.ie

The main contact number is  +353 (0) 91 563518  or 1 890 799 997
You’ll find out more about our general insurance services at www.burkeins.ie

By choosing to deal with us you access almost half a century of insurance expertise – which isn’t usually available via the web!
staticContent.title: About Us
